headline: Zoetis Stock Rises 13% in a Month: Time to Add to Your Portfolio?
summary: ZTS jumps 13% in a month as strong new product sales, strategic deals, and rising earnings estimates boost investor confidence.

headline: Why Is Zoetis (ZTS) Up 8.1% Since Last Earnings Report?
summary: Zoetis (ZTS) reported earnings 30 days ago. What's next for the stock? We take a look at earnings estimates for some clues.

headline: Zoetis Releases 2024 Sustainability Progress Update
summary: PARSIPPANY, N.J., June 05, 2025--Zoetis published its 2024 Sustainability Progress Update "Advancing Sustainability in Animal Health for a Better Future" to highlight the company’s continued progress toward achieving its Driven to Care aspirations. The publication represents Zoetis’ fifth year reporting on its purpose-driven actions across three pillars – Communities, Animals and the Planet – that strengthen its business by creating long-term value, enhancing stakeholder trust, and supporting su

headline: 2 Recession-Proof Stocks to Buy and Hold
summary: Zoetis helps people care for pets, which many consider as honorary family members.  President Trump's trade policies are sparking concerns about a potential recession.  Here are two great examples for investors to consider: Zoetis (NYSE: ZTS) and HCA Healthcare (NYSE: HCA).
